thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Anhui Genuine New Materials proposes FY 2017 dividend payment plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Anhui Genuine New Materials proposes FY 2017 dividend payment plan

organizations.name: anhui genuine new materials co ltd

text:
Jan 23(Reuters) - Anhui Genuine New Materials Co Ltd :
* Controlling shareholder proposed to pay a cash dividend of 2 yuan(pre-tax) for every 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 4 new shares for every 10 shares, as FY 2017 dividend payment plan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/4NMFiD
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
